resources.string: Phone number of the sender, every time an sms received with phone number , the filter will be triggered
Each time an sms received contains the text entered below the filter will be triggered
This step is required to select your preferable Slack channel to post you automatic message, you can also personalize the content of this message.
You selected the channel : %1$s all dedicated filter will send messages on this slack channel
Allow the application to post incoming tagged SMS Message to your selected channels
Depending on the rules, Applet will post messages on this channel : %1$s
Allow your application to access SMS in order to post your desired messages on slack.
Click on the button bellow , a Web Browser will be opened select your preferred slack group and authorize the app access
